moves.name: Charming Smile
moves.description: Flash a winning smile at an opponent, earning their trust.

moves.name: Flattering Words
moves.description: Compliment your opponent, making them more receptive to your cause.

moves.name: Peace Offering
moves.description: Offer a gift to your opponent, greatly increasing their favor.

moves.name: Inspiring Speech
moves.description: Give a rousing speech that charms all opponents slightly.

moves.name: Master Negotiation
moves.description: Use your diplomatic prowess to win over an opponent completely.

moves.name: Defensive Posture
moves.description: Take a non-threatening stance, showing you mean no harm.

moves.name: Compassionate Care
moves.description: Tend to an ally's wounds, demonstrating your peaceful nature.

moves.name: Mass Appeal
moves.description: Appeal to all opponents at once with your charisma.
